name: Catching Loot Adventure
description:
Catch the treasure in the correct treasure bag by tapping the left or right side of the screen, catch the wrong treasure and you lose!

Game modes:
Easy Mode - Treasure drop from center lane
Hard Mode - Treasure can drop from any of the lanes
Levels Mode - For each level you must last a certain amount of time that increases with each level

I hope you enjoyed playing, please consider leaving a review or checking out one of my other games! If you want to reach out to me my contact info is provided on the settings page in the game.
